name: Urban Flirbin
description:
This is not Flappy Bird.

Soar through the streets of the WormRealm Urban area to help Mr.Birb escape the dreaded city smog. Dodge all sorts of obstacles and dress up Mr.Birb as you compete to see how far you can get! Can you help Mr.Birb and guide him back to his nest?

Feel free to comment!

Please note, this version of Urban flirbin is definitely just a prototype, no updates can be guaranteed. That being said, if there are a few downloads and comments then you can expect to see things along the line of big fixes, new content such as maps, obstacles and so on, and even a fully developed game, provided Urban Flirbin gets enough attention here on itch.io. You can also expect a browser and mobile port under the fact Urban Flirbin does well enough to see a budget. Until then, feel free to comment any ideas you want to see and critique the game! Until then,

PyroLLama Studios.
